content: I was reading about the new memorial in Mineral Wells, Texas and got to thinking about another memorial. September 11, 2006 a memorial to 9-11 and those who died there was unveiled in Bayonne NJ. The memorial called, The Tear Drop Memorial" was donated by Russia. Bayonne is a little piece of nothing in NJ but from there The Statue Of Liberty is perfectly focused in the tear drop. It's a most beautiful monument. What's hard to understand is why it received no press and is still basically unknown? Anyway here it is. "http://www.truthorfiction.com/rumors/r/russian-911-memorial.htm" As one can see from the URL, some even doubt it's existence. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?

title: Russian 9-11 Memorial in NJ

content: Some of the C-rats use to come from Bayonne. I remember someone else put this up(the Russina memorial) on a different thread & yes, it sure didn't get much attention. I'm not too far from Bayonne(45 minutes or so) & I didn't know about it.
